original_text: And as soon as she saw that he had left his garment in her hand and had fled out of the house,
korean_text: 그 여인이 요셉이 그의 옷을 자기 손에 버려두고 도망하여 나감을 보고

sentences.original_text: And as soon as she saw
that he had left his garment in her hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 옷을 그녀 손에 두고 간 것을

sentences.original_text: and had fled out of the house
